description: Source code for a REST API controller managing facilities within an airport facility service platform. Defines endpoints for listing, retrieving by ID, creating, updating, and deleting facility entities.

classes.name: FacilityController
classes.description: REST Controller providing endpoints to manage facilities, including listing, retrieval, creation, modification, and deletion of Facility entities.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list facilities, optionally filtered by facility type and active status.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific Facility entity by its UUID, throwing NotFoundException if not present.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new facility, ensuring no duplicate exists and setting metadata.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Facility entity based on provided fields, throwing NotFoundException if entity does not exist.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a facility by its UUID, throwing NotFoundException if not found.
